scripts.predev: rm -rf buildcache ./src/external-posts ./src/components/custom-components .src/blocks-mdx-inject-snippets ./public/external-posts ./public/custom-components && mkdir -p ./src/external-posts ./src/components/custom-components ./src/posts/mdx-inject-snippets ./public/external-posts ./public/custom-components && for folder in blocks-html-cache blocks-json-cache rss-cache bib-files-cache external-content blocks-mdx-inject-snippets-cache markdown-cache .astro; do if [ -d "./tmp/$folder" ]; then echo "Deleting $folder folder"; rm -rf "./tmp/$folder"; else echo "No $folder folder to delete"; fi; done
scripts.prebuild-local: rm -rf buildcache ./src/external-posts ./src/components/custom-components ./src/blocks-mdx-inject-snippets ./public/external-posts ./public/custom-components && for folder in blocks-html-cache blocks-json-cache rss-cache bib-files-cache external-content blocks-mdx-inject-snippets-cache markdown-cache .astro; do if [ -d "./tmp/$folder" ]; then echo "Deleting $folder folder"; rm -rf "./tmp/$folder"; else echo "No $folder folder to delete"; fi; done
scripts.prebuild-localnodl: rm -rf buildcache ./src/assets/notion/* ./src/external-posts ./src/components/custom-components ./src/blocks-mdx-inject-snippets ./public/notion/* ./public/external-posts ./public/custom-components && for folder in blocks-html-cache blocks-json-cache rss-cache bib-files-cache external-content blocks-mdx-inject-snippets-cache markdown-cache .astro; do if [ -d "./tmp/$folder" ]; then echo "Deleting $folder folder"; rm -rf "./tmp/$folder"; else echo "No $folder folder to delete"; fi; done
